Articles.Content:
I Just installed a bunch of mods. I then started the game as normal and got though the loading. When I try pressing start game, it stays at the start Menu. Any solutions.

Also Im new to forums. Hi everyone

Pc Specs: 

Spoiler

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/ibuypower-desktop-amd-fx-series-16gb-memory-2tb-hard-drive-black-red/4575215.p?skuId=4575215&ref=212&loc=1&ksid=e3aecfcd-b165-478e-a331-a2d0d234648e&ksprof_id=8&ksaffcode=pg199028&ksdevice=c&lsft=ref:212,loc:2

Mods: 

Spoiler

ModuleManager 2.7.5, KerbalAlarmClock - 3.8.3.0, TAC Life Support, version 0.12.7.0, Mechjeb, Kerbol Star System, Kopernicus, HyperEdit, Kerbal Invitory system, Kerbal Engineer

The first thing to check is to see whether you can start and run the game without any mods.

Then, add each mod one by one and restart the game each time until you re-experience the issue - this will help narrow down the cause.
Thanks. Found out Tac Life Support Mod was the blame
